titles.title: Honoring the life of fallen Officer Daniel Vasquez and expressing condolences to his family.
Honoring the life of fallen Officer Daniel Vasquez and expressing condolences to his family.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the memory and legacy of Officer Daniel Vasquez, who made the ultimate sacrifice in the line of duty. The resolution also expresses condolences to his loved ones.
